Plot: A combination "before the rage" and "after the rage" of world middleweight boxing champion Jake LaMotta's tumultuous life and times.
Title: The Bronx Bull
Writer: Rustam Branaman (screenplay), Martin Guigui (screenplay), Chris Anderson (based on the book by), Sharon McGehee (based on the book by), Jake LaMotta (based on the book by)
Actors: William Forsythe, Joe Mantegna, Tom Sizemore, Paul Sorvino
